title: People you'd like to know: Paige
creator_credit: Janet Weaver and WGBH Educational Foundation
brief_description: A look at the integrating of a child with Down’s Syndrome into a regular school. Notes the protective attitude of the child who has taken Paige “under her wing”. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
